page.title: 13A Day in the Life of Matthew
page.content: My name is Matthew. I get up at 0830 and have shreddies and milk and tea. I get dressed and go back down stairs and watch the Saturday Super Store on telly which is short for television.My sister comes down too.At 1100 I might go out and play with my capgun.Then my best friend might come round,his name is Patrick.We may go inside and play with my Star Wars toys.I have tea at about 1600,I may have tomato salad or sandwiches and a drink.I sometimes have wars with my Star Wars toys.My Star Wars are plastic and some of the ships are metal.They are quite good toys to play with.
